display_long_description:
Welcome to the world of **PlayPal**  with a group of charming AI characters, where you can chat, roleplay, play games and more.
# Here's what you can do:
- **Social & Chat**: You can start a voice conversation with them anytime and anywhere, support for English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Japanese and Chinese. Or you can have them follow you as you tour the town. Start a card game or go on an adventure with them to play a zombie-fighting game.

[media]
Or dance with them all night:

[media]
- **Farm management**: You can also enjoy a relaxing time on the farm, planting a variety of crops and selling them to the town. You can also raise farm animals. Perhaps catching butterflies can be a lot of fun too.

[media]

- **Crafting**: Gather various resources to craft items and fulfill town orders.Perhaps you might find it tiring, so you can capture some Pals to help you with the work.

[media]

The game is still in development, with exciting features to come: additional AI Companion characters, a diverse array of charming Pals, a mine full of adventure, and a combat space rich with enemies.(Join us: https://discord.gg/xgtkNRXMPs)
